name: IT201_Sprint04_Xavier_Santana
description:
Right click to draw objects. Change various attributes of drawn objects using sliders and toggles. Buttons next to color sliders will change color value to maximum if not at maximum or to zero if already at maximum. All commands are hotkeyed as follows.

1-6 - change shape (6 is random shape)

F1-F4 - change animation (pressing twice in a row will disable animation)

C, R, S - toggle random color, rotation, scale respectively

D - toggles destroy

M - enables/disables UI elements

Escape - clears all objects on screen

Backspace - resets scene (clears all objects and reverts all settings to default)
